title: Domino Effect - Watch Face
summary: Stylish & clean watch face for serious & classy looks.
developerAddress: Ukraine, 02081, Kiev, Darnitskij area, Anna Akhmatova street, 22, office 4009

descriptionHTML:
⚪️⚫️Classic game, classy watch face.

Domino Effect features a precise, simple design that sends a clear, laconic message. You are in control of your time.

This unique watch face fits any style, but especially - official suits and dresses. Also features an additional minimalistic digital dial theme.

Great choice for serious occasions.

🌟Main features:
- Laconic black & white;
- Domino styled theme;
- Simple digital theme;
- 12/24 hours mode;
- Displays current day and date;
- Smart ambient mode.

⌚Is it for me?
Domino Effect is designed for Android Wear watches and works perfectly both on round and square models.

Supports all Android Wear watches, including:
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 1;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 2;
✔ ASUS ZenWatch 3;
✔ Moto 360 Sport;
✔ Motorola 360 1st gen;
✔ Motorola 360 2nd gen;
✔ LG G Watch;
✔ LG Watch Style;
✔ LG Watch Sport;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane;
✔ LG G Watch Urbane 2;
✔ Samsung Gear Live;
✔ Sony Smartwatch 3;
✔ Casio WSD-F10;
✔ Fossil Q Founder;
✔ Huawei Watch;
✔ Huawei Watch 2;
✔ Polar M600;
✔ TAG Heuer Connected.

💣Important Notice!💥
Samsung Gear, Samsung Gear S, S2 and S3 are NOT YET supported. Please, for Samsung smartwatches based on Tizen follow the link: https://goo.gl/M1ABvk

🚀How to install?
This watch face will be installed automatically from your paired phone.
If it doesn't show up please go to the Android Wear App > Settings and Resync all apps.
Once installed, you can select the Domino Effect Watch Face from the Android Wear App or directly on your watch. Few taps and you are ready to go!

📝Want to drop us a message?
We'd love hearing from you!
Contact us via our website: http://boostwatch.style
Google+ page: https://goo.gl/CJ79u2
or e-mail: wearables@boost.solutions

Not sure if ready to buy? Try out this watch face in our Collection app for free! - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.boost.watchcore 🙊
comments: Superb.Looks great on my Huawei Watch 2 Sport
I can't get it to work. How do I use this thing? I have a Tag connected. I tried re syncing the apps on the android wear but laconic still does not come up as an option.
Sympathetic to the moto 360's flat tire, minimalistic and elegant.
Nice and clean... Very well done...clean watch face and easy to read at a quick glance...excellent job!
Lovely, crisp design. Perfect for those who want something a little different and eye-catching.
It's just ok... Needs a couple more options.  Would be nice to be interactive.
